text:
Thanks everyone here for your comments! I ended up creating a prequel post describing the current state of Mu and publishing both:

<http://akkartik.name/post/mu-2019-1>

<http://akkartik.name/post/mu-2019-2>

I've credited everyone in this thread at the end of the second post; please let me know if you have a preferred link you'd like me to include for you there.
